tool_description: Calculates the appropriate refund amount based on item condition, policy compliance, damage assessment, and applicable fees or deductions.

original_price.description: Original purchase price of the item

policy_refund_type.description: Policy-determined refund type: full, partial, store_credit, none

restocking_fee_applicable.description: Whether restocking fee should be applied

shipping_cost_deduction.description: Shipping cost to deduct from refund

error_messages: Invalid original_price: Price must be a positive number.
Invalid condition_score: Score must be an integer between 0-100.
Invalid damage_reduction_percent: Percentage must be between 0-100.
Invalid policy_refund_type: Type must be one of [full, partial, store_credit, none].
Invalid shipping_cost_deduction: Must be a non-negative number not exceeding original price.
usage: Use after inspection, damage assessment, and policy check to calculate final refund amount. Considers all factors affecting refund value.

refund_type.description: Type of refund: cash, credit_card, store_credit

deductions_applied.description: List of deductions applied to calculate final amount
